Articles.Content:
No, this is not an Easter egg formation of any kind.

It\'s better:

No, this is not an Easter egg formation of any kind.

'If I have seen further, it is by standing on the helmets of Kerbals.'

-- Stuff Isaac Kerman Said, 3rd Revised Edition

I though that exact same thing when I got them all to balance properly.

Here\'s a pyramid:

LAYDEEEEEEEEEZ AND GENNELMEEN! BOOOOYS AND GURRRRLS!

Roll up, and see the AMAY-ZING KERBAL BROTHERS perform their LATEST ACROBATIC ACTS!

They\'ll ASTOUND AND AMAZE YOU!

Yeah, that was the thirst thing I thought after seeing this.

Edited for bad grammar. Wow, is it just me, or are the forums particularly slow today?
